page.title: 12MY DAY BY PAUL.
page.content: My dad keeps one of the pubs. Today I got up at 8 o' clock for a breakfast of jam, toast and tea. I took Brandy (the dog) down the lane and biked to school at 8.30. At school I played, Blocky (running, hiding, when seen running to a post shouting blocky 1,2,3 and the name of the person seen). Assembly was at 9.30 then maths. We played tig (chasing) during first playtime 10.40-11. We read till dinner. I had school dinner, beef burgers, vegetables, chocolate pie and custard. Outside we played leapfrog. From 1 o'clock we did art. I was sent in from afternoon playtime for dragging Stephen across the field. Finished school at 3.30 before going to bed at 9.43pm I watched TV, had three snacks,played on my bike and went to the River Swale. P. Whiteman.
